H0.text: In April 1966, Bobbi Gibb became the first woman to run the entire distance of which marathon. New York City Marathon

H1.text: In April 1966, Bobbi Gibb became the first woman to run the entire distance of which marathon. London Marathon

H2.text: In April 1966, Bobbi Gibb became the first woman to run the entire distance of which marathon. Chicago Marathon

H3.text: In April 1966, Bobbi Gibb became the first woman to run the entire distance of which marathon. Boston marathon

A4.text: Much later, she would be recognized by the race organizers as the first woman to run the entire Boston Marathon.
